tip.text: Sometimes you may see walking merchants.\nYou might be able to find useful items for sale.
Once a beginner gets to level 10, head to $map:2000188$ of $map:2000001$ for a job.
Do you equip new items after purchasing?\n Remember to wear new gear immediately.
Buying a house for the first time?\nFind an apartment complex at $map:2000002$ Livingston House of Commons of Salisbury House of Commons.
Are you looking to buy a new house? Click on the icon in front of the empty land or house to sign a contract.
If you want to buy a home, you can click the house icon for the contract.
Each account can only have one house. A house is shared within the characters.
If you want to rename your house, click on the contract.\nFrom there you can change the name via contract.
Houses are not only sold in villages.\nMany other places carry a variety of home sizes.
The better location, the more expensive the house is.
If you terminate your housing contract, all your items will be kept in the mover's storage warehouse.
Items can only be kept in the mover's storage warehouse for 90 days or it will disappear.
If you want to move to a different house, you can terminate your current contract.
After the contract ends, there is a period of time the house is unavailable.
If you would like to terminate your contract, click on the housing agreement contract to cancel.
A housing contract lasts thirty (30) days.\nYou can extend the term through the contract.
You can view real estate pricing through Tria's $map:02000123$.
If you withdraw all items in the house, it will be moved to the mover's storage warehouse
When you are at your home, you can press 'B' to modify your house.
You can place items down in land or inside your building.
If you don't like the orientation of an item in your home, you can rotate it.
Bunny Girl's shop is available in construction mode.
$map:02000036$ sells a variety of items to decorate your home.
Grab bag merchants can be found in event maps.
Purchase rare items from Grab bag merchants.
You can easily go home using the return feature.\nYou can also go travel to the original map you were in.
You can return home by pressing the T button and visiting your home.
Placing souvenirs in your home may give you certain effects.
Place a mannequin in your home to quickly switch clothes from one set to another.
A TV placed in a home can be turned off and on.
View your own design on an item by making it with a design item.
You can design outfits, as well as construction items.
You can also purchase other player's designs through the design shop.
Dress your character with a design with your name on it
Express your own individuality with design items.
If you sell an item on the designer's shop,\nyou get the sale price after production cost and fees.
Visit the $map:02000107$ if you want to change to a stylish appearance.\nServices used here require Merit.
You can personalize yourself with the hair salon and plastic surgery located at $map:02000107$.\nHowever, services used here require Merit..
You can change your hair, eyes, skin, etc in $map:02000107$.\nHowever, services used here require Merit.
$map:02000107$'s $map:52000010$ can do plastic surgery.\nHowever, services used here require Merit.
$map:02000107$'s $map:52000008$ can change hairstyles.\nHowever, services used here require Merit.
$map:02000107$'s $map:52000008$ makeup artist, $npc:11000256$, can do your makeup.\nHowever, services used here require Merit.
$map:52000009$'s $npc:11000257$ can dye your equipment to any color.\nHowever, services used require Merit.
Try changing your hair, face, and skin color right now at $map:02000107$!\nHowever, services used here requiret Merit.
You can change the billboards in towns to an image you want to put up.
To put an image up on a billboard, you need at least 3 hours prior for a reservation.
Billboards are all over the world in major cities, such as $map:2000001$ and $map:2000100$\nYou reserve the board for one hour.
You can schedule when you want your image on the board for everyone to see.
In your Character information window, you can press profile to select an image you want set.
If you arrive at a new town, visit the shop equipment.
You can do dynamtic actions by pressing the keys F1 ~ F12.
Apartments are usually offered at a reasonable price.\nIf the payment for a house is expensive, try an apartment.
Appear as a cute slime doing the sekoumyon action.
Arrows are not required when using a bow.
Throwing stars do not need to be recharged.
SP is required to use active skills.
EP is required to use action skills.
If there is no EP, you cannot use action skills.
Learn a new skill by dragging it to a hotkey for use.
Falling out of the map makes a tombstone.
When a tombstone gets raised up, another player can revive you by beating it to break it.
Put your potions on a quickslot for easy use.
In the shadow of the breakthrough drug that can withstand the miasma was reportedly developed.
You can wear different throwing stars in each hand.
You can wear a throwing star in each hand.
You can equip a dagger in each hand.
You can wear different daggers in each hand.
After receiving a job, it will take time to heal the wounds from a tombstone after reviving.
Beginners are not affected by wounded soul from reviving through a tombstone.
After reviving, it will take some time to heal from the ruling of wounded soul.
If you reach 0 HP after reviving once, your tombstone will be steel.
You are able to revive yourself after rising a tombstone.\nHowever, it will require Merit to revive in the same position.
After reviving from a tombstone, it will take some time to remove the ruling of wounded soul.\nDuring this state, it is impossible to revive in the same location.
You can find a gap in space by entering a hat located in fields.
Once a hat is found in field maps, you can enter and enjoy bonus maps.
Iron Hog's armor is famous for being strong.
There is no ants in ant tunnel.
The ruler of the winding canyons, $npc:22000022$ is in fact a woman.
The entrance to $map:61000005$ opens up every 10 minutes.
Eating herbs recover your HP slowly.
If your HP is full, you will not be able to use pots.
Wicked fairy $npc:22000003$ and $npc:22000004$ are sisters.
You can change your keys in the keyboard settings through preferences.
Most skills can be learned automatically through leveling up.
There are skills that can be learned through skillbook items.
If there is a wall in front of you, you can use $skill:20000011$ skill.
Those who climb walls like high places.
You can jump by using the Alt key or C key.
Attacking using the Ctrl key or X key.
You can automatically pick up items after receinving an achivement.
By pressing the Z key, you can pick up items.
While holding to a ladder, you can press the direction keys to move.
Pull traffic lights from $map:02000083$ to swing them around\nThis is considered vandalism.
Once a beginner reaches level 10, they can visit Tria's $map:2000188$$pp2: for a job.
Be careful when deciding a job, as you cannot change it
Take advantage of the world map. You can get a lot of information from it.
Find the location of taxis by the world map.
When you open the world map, you can view the quests you can start.
You can see which map you are on by the world map.
With the world map, you can see location of bosses.
Wondering where people gather at? \nWith the world map, you can view the hot places.
You can meet a doctor located in the hospitals in main cities.
With the treatment of the doctor, you can clear any conditions you have.
You can upgrade your skills through the skill window.
Skills need $item:40100001$ to upgrade. They can be found from most grocery traders.
Elite monsters and bosses drop red, blue, and green crystals, which are needed for skill upgrades.
There are rumors about $item:40100022$ in the heart of an evil boss.\nIt is needed to upgrade skills.
To upgrade your skills, you need special crystals.
You can also get a title from achieving a trophy.
If you pick up a lot of items, you can get a trophy that allows you to auto pick up items.
A taxi stop is available after discovering it.
After examining a taxi stop, you can use it to go to another taxi stop.
You can use the taxi at level 25.
Taxi will arrive immediately after calling for one.
With a Lotus Air Taxi, you can move to any map that you have previously been to.
When right clicking a player, you can do a variety of actions such as party invite, whisper, trade, and more.
You can party invite someone by right click their character.
Up to 10 people can be in a party.
By opening the Community window, you can see who is in your map.
You can add friends through the Community window.
Party invite another character by right clicking on their character.
You can block messages by a certain player by right clicking them.
Make a 1:1 trade with another character by right clicking them.
Enlarge the minimap by pressing the TAB key.
You can see the name of the NPC by hovering over their icon in the minimap.
On the top right of your minimap, you can change settings to display or hide certain information.
Characters in the same map will be displayed above your minimap.
The skill $skill:20000011$ teaches you how to climb cliffs.
If you cannot reach somewhere by jumping, take advance of the $skill:20000011$ skill.
Some monsters you are able to hold onto if you are close enough.
You can fly in the air using $skill:20000021$ skill.
Double click on a mount item to ride it.
You can quickslot your mount to easily mount and unmount it.
Pressing the X key while on a mount activates a unique skill.
Falling from big heights can hurt and sometimes can cause death.
$map:02000064$ has a variety of events. Events occur every so often.
As soon as an event begins, you can click on the icon in the minimap to be transported to $map:02000064$.
Right click on the chat tab to change what to text to display.
Shift + Left click on an item to link the item in chat.
When chatting, press the Tab chat \nto easily change who you wish to target to.
Channel Megaphone and World Megaphone requires Merits to use.
Kill mobs faster by fighting along others.
If you don't know who is attacking monsters, don't hit just to be safe!
Try fighting strong monsters.
Join forces with everyone and fight strong monsters.
You will still get loot from monsters even if you aren't in a party.
You don't need to fight in a party to get monster loot.
You can purchase new actions from the Merit Market.
When you're currently a tombstone, you will not receive EXP.
After reviving, you will not receive damage for a while.
Help resurrect other players by hitting their tombstone.
If you have the ruling of wounded soul debuff and you reach 0 HP, a steel tombstone will spawn instead.
Others cannot help you when you're a steel tombstone.
Walk to the nearest healing spot.
Check your inbox whenever you get mail.
Rumors of $map:2000001$ guards being twins is not true.
Nobody knows $npc:11000374$'s gender.
$npc:11000106$ My man is warm only to women.
If you are in front of a lever, pull it.
Use the mouse wheel to zoom in to get a closer look when decorating.
There may be a way to get treasure chests out of reach.
Find out where items are being sent in $map:2000161$.
Items and mesos will disappear from the ground after 90 seconds.
Search maps you have been in often. You may find a golden treasure box.
If you find strange pictures in the billboards, right click to report it.
Type in '/pinvite character name'\nto invite a character into your party
If you wish to leave a party, \nyou can type /pleave.
Create a guild by pressing the G key.
Create a Guild with like-minded friends.
The guild's trophy is the sum of all member's trophies in the guild
In the Hall of Flags of $map:02000001$\nShows rank 1 of guild trophy, personal trophy, and guild battlefield.
In the Hall of Flags of $map:02000100$\n Shows the guild marks of guild trophies ranked 1, 2, and 3.
In the Hall of Flags of $map:02000023$\n Shows the player's profile pic of the 3 top ranked trophy holders.
In the Hall of Flags of $map:02000064$\n Shows the guild and individual trophies of the top 3.
In the Hall of Flags of $map:02000051$\n Shows the guild marks of the top 3 guild championship.
In the Hall of Flags of $map:02000217$\n Shows the guild marks of the top 3 guild championship.
The Hall of Flags rankings update once a day.
If you interact with the flags on the Hall of Flags, you can pull up Maview to view more information.
Depending on your guild results of the Guild Championship, you can receive $item:90000006$.
By entering '/ginvite CharacterName' \nYou can invite a player into your guild.
$npc:11000620$ in $map:02000001$ is a battle equipment trader.
$npc:11000626$ in $map:02000001$ is a mount trader.
$map:02000001$'s $npc:11000620$ and $npc:11000626$\naccept only $item:90000006$ as currency.
$npc:11000508$ is popular for several reasons.
Blacksmith $npc:11000508$ in $map:02000203$ can make your items stronger.
If enhancing your weapon fails, your equipment might come out as damaged.\nDamaged equipment cannot be enhanced any further.
Enhancing your equipment can prove to be effective in combat with others.
$npc:11000511$ Iron only sunny.
$npc:11000511$ is the only daughter of the Suavrich family.
If you give $item:40100023$ to $npc:11000511$\nShe will give you a precious antique from her home.
$npc:11000511$ wants $item:40100023$. She will exchange you them for equipment packages.
At $map:65000001$, you can compete 1:1 with other players.
At $map:65000001$, the winner will go up against new challengers.
At $map:65000002$, only a maximum of 10 other people can compete.
Find out whats happening in the world today by checking out the news in Maview.
For a detail description of items, monsters, and NPCs \n Check out Maview.
Check out the world's real-estate market \Simply view it by Maview.
Please report any player if they provide an inconvienient experience for you.
If you do not wish to view a image on a bulletin board \nRight click on the bulletin board.
When you report a user's chat \nTheir chat will become censored to you.
When you report a user's profile image or bulletin board \nThe image will become censored to you.
Under $npc:11000514$, there has not been one jailbreak so far.
You can give bail to $npc:11000514$ to get out of jail. \nHowever, this has only been a rumor.
You will be penalized strongly for a false report.
Constantly causing an inconvienience will inflict Velma's judgement to you.
With Velma's judgement, you cannot chat, UGC, etc.
If you put effort in prison while having Velma's judgement\nYou can get released quicker.
If you make a false report, you can go to jail.
Take a tour of the prison by visiting $npc:11000585$ in $map:02000062$.
Shadow world is a distorted dark world in a break of space.
There are rumors that there are breaks to the Shadow World all over the world.
Investigate the monument to go through the distorted space and into the Shadow World.
If you examine an angered altar in the Shadow World, your shield will disappear. \nYou will then be able to fight other players.
Invite your friends and guild members into a group conversation.
In $map:02000216$ you can trade items.
The Black Crusade operates the open secret of $map:02000216$.
You can set the maid's name and title through their profile.
It is not possible to give maids housework.
$npc:11000790$ and $npc:11000792$ maids specialize in alchemy.
$npc:11000770$ and $npc:11000780$ maids have cooking skills.
$npc:11000787$ and $npc:11000779$ maids make drinks.
$npc:11000789$ and $npc:11000512$ maids specialize in producing necklaces.
$npc:11000777$ and $npc:11000544$ maids specialize in producing rings.
Maid $npc:11000770$'s specialty dish is grilled eel.
